    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Encounter(java.util.ArrayList<Monster> teamMonsters, java.util.ArrayList<Hero> teamHeros)
      The constructor initializes an encounter with a set of monsters and heros.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispData()
      This function is to purely display the statistics of each character after a turn.
      int genHero(boolean turn)
      This function takes a boolean input that indicates whether it is a Hero turn or not, if it's not hero turn it generates the hero index based on @param attackChance of the heros selected.
      int genRandHero()
      This function is used to generate a random hero who has not fainted.
      int genRandMonster(int size)
      The function generates a random number in the range of 0 till the input @param size.
      java.util.ArrayList<Hero> getTeamHeros() 
      java.util.ArrayList<Monster> getTeamMonsters() 
      int getWinIndicator() 
      void heroChance()
      This function is used to call attackChoice and to generate a random hero.In addition it also checks the encounter winIndicator to check whether heros have won
      void monsterChance()
      This function generates 2 random numbers one for hero , one for monster and checks if all heroes have fainted and monsters have won.

      • heroChance

        public void heroChance()
        This function is used to call attackChoice and to generate a random hero.In addition it also checks the encounter winIndicator to check whether heros have won

      • monsterChance

        public void monsterChance()
        This function generates 2 random numbers one for hero , one for monster and checks if all heroes have fainted and monsters have won.
